titles.title: SF102 For the beauty of the earth.

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For the beauty of the earth,
for the beauty of the skies,
for the love which from our birth
over and around us lies:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For the beauty of each hour
of the day and of the night,
hill and vale, and tree and flower,
sun and moon and stars of light:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For the joy of ear and eye,
for the heart and mind's delight
for the mystic harmony
linking sense to sound and sight:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For the joy of human love,
brother, sister, parent, child,
friends on earth, and friends above,
pleasures pure and undefiled:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For each perfect gift and sign
of your love so freely given,
graces human and divine,
flowers of the earth and buds of heaven:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Gracious God, to you we raise
this our sacrifice of praise.
